House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07831
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE TREATMENT OF ACTIVE MILITARY PERSONNEL WITH POST-TRAUMATIC STRESS DISORDER AND PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Recognizes the relevance of the advent of increasing awareness on the issue of mental health as it relates to the country’s Armed Forces; Aims to institutionalize the treatment and prevention of post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) for the benefit of the country’s Armed Forces.
